setAllCaps(boolean).Description: Call when allCaps is set on TextView. When used on devices running API 18 or below, this method does nothing.

updateTransformationMethod().Description: Updates widget's TransformationMethod so that the transformed text can be processed. Should be called in the widget constructor. When used on devices running API 18 or below, this method does nothing.

Returns: same copy if the array already contains EmojiCompat InputFilter. A new array copy if not.
getFilters(android.text.InputFilter[]).Description: Appends EmojiCompat InputFilters to the widget InputFilters. Should be called by @B_android#widget#TextView#setFilters_E@ to update the InputFilters. When used on devices running API 18 or below, this method returns filters that is given as a parameter.

ClassDesc: Utility class to enhance custom TextView widgets with @B_android#support#text#emoji#EmojiCompat_E@.
